org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.tool.controls

Class DraggableControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.tool.controls.DraggableControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PageViewHoverWidget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MoveRegionTool, ResizeRegionTool

    public abstract class DraggableControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PageViewHoverWidget
    Base class for draggable page view controls (e.g. for resize and move).
    Author:
    clc
